title:
Peace of Mind with CyberBay’s
Program Safeguards
content: We’ve built in safeguards across the entire ecosystem to protect your assets and provide you with peace of mind.

safeguards.title: Background Checks
safeguards.description: Applicants must pass a rigorous background check including government-issued ID and facial verification.

safeguards.title: Sign-In Verification
safeguards.description: All sessions are gated with KYC to verify Bug Hunters’ identities.

safeguards.title: Sandbox Environment
safeguards.description: Inspection can only be conducted with the permissions from your organization.

safeguards.title: Safety Kill Switch
safeguards.description: If we observe any behaviors that deviate from the bounty scope and requirements, our Lighthouse technology detects and disconnects sessions.
